dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3647 IH: Aviation Investment and Recruitment Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Molinaro (for himself, Ms. Scholten, Mr. Mann, Mr. Stanton, Ms. Titus, and Mr. Stauber) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018 to reauthorize aviation workforce development programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Aviation Investment and Recruitment Act of 2023 or the AIR Act of 2023.
Section 625(b)(1) of the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018 (49 U.S.C. 40101 note) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking $5,000,000 each place it appears and inserting $20,000,000; and
by striking 2019 through 2023 each place it appears and inserting 2024 through 2028.
